thread.title: Pyeongchang 2018: An Olympics With Big Hurdles

author: Rachel Bachman
title: Pyeongchang 2018: An Olympics With Big Hurdles
text:
The Pyeongchang Winter Olympics are the kind of Games that Olympic leaders are trying to leave behind.
These Games, which open Friday, spurred $10 billion in construction of facilities in a remote area far from the European and North American hubs of winter sports. Ticket sales lagged as tensions with the host countryâ€™s increasingly restive nuclear-armed neighbor, North Korea, scared off some visitors.
Now,...
